item.title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Season 3 Confirmed for 2026 with Official Teaser PV
item.description: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation has officially announced Season 3 for 2026. The first teaser PV was screened at Anime Expo 2025 and released on TOHO animationâ€™s official channel.
